title: A psalme of thanks-giving to be sung by the children of Christs Hospitall, on Tuesday in the Easter Holy-dayes, at S. Maries Spittle, for their founders and benefactors. Anno Domini, 1641.
author: Christ's Hospital (London, England)
publisher: by Richard Oulton, dwelling neere Christ-Church,
notes: A variant: without engraved borders or patient counts.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
